trans-unit.source: The base class from which HTTP modules that are configurable with the [<system.identityModel.services>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/system-identitymodel-services.md) element (<see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.SystemIdentityModelServicesSection" />) derive.
trans-unit.target: A classe base da qual os módulos HTTP configuráveis com o elemento [<System.identityModel.services>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/system-identitymodel-services.md) (<see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.SystemIdentityModelServicesSection" />) derivam.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase" />.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources (except memory) used by the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos (exceto memória) usados pela instância atual da classe <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase" />.

trans-unit.source: Override this method in your derived class to release resources.
trans-unit.target: Substitua este método em sua classe derivada para liberar recursos.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation is empty.
trans-unit.target: A implementação padrão está vazia.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration" /> object that is in effect for the current module.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o objeto <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration" /> que está em vigor para o módulo atual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration" /> object that is in effect for the current module.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration" /> objeto está em vigor para o módulo atual.

trans-unit.source: An attempt to set the property to <see langword="null" /> occurs.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre uma tentativa de definir a propriedade para <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The application object which contains this module.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de aplicativo que contém esse módulo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the HTTP module.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o módulo HTTP.

trans-unit.source: This method implements the <xref:System.Web.IHttpModule.Init%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method by initializing the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> property to the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, invoking the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializeModule%2A> method, and then invoking the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializePropertiesFromConfiguration%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Implementa esse método o <xref:System.Web.IHttpModule.Init%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método Inicializando o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> propriedade para o valor da <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade invocar o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializeModule%2A> método e, em seguida, chamar o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializePropertiesFromConfiguration%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Derived classes override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializeModule%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializePropertiesFromConfiguration%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Derivado de substituição de classes de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializeModule%2A> e <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializePropertiesFromConfiguration%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The application object which contains this module.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de aplicativo que contém esse módulo.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, initializes the current module and prepares it to handle events from its ASP.NET application object.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, inicializa o módulo atual e o prepara para tratar eventos de seu objeto de aplicativo ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializeModule%2A> method to load any additional configuration state as well as to register event handling methods with specific events raised by the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> object.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.InitializeModule%2A> método carregar qualquer estado de configuração adicionais, bem como para registrar os métodos de manipulação de eventos com eventos específicos gerados pelo <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> objeto.

trans-unit.source: When this method is called from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.Init%2A> method, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> property has already been initialized.
trans-unit.target: Quando este método é chamado da <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.Init%2A> método, o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> propriedade já foi inicializada.

trans-unit.source: You can get the configuration object that is in effect for this module from this property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode obter o objeto de configuração que está em vigor para este módulo dessa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> property should be used for all token processing in this module.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> propriedade deve ser usada para todo o processamento de token neste módulo.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, initializes module properties based on values in the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration" /> object that is in effect for it.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, inicializa as propriedades do módulo com base nos valores no objeto <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration" /> que está em vigor para ela.

trans-unit.source: When this method is called from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.Init%2A> method, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> property has already been initialized.
trans-unit.target: Quando este método é chamado da <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.Init%2A> método, o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.HttpModuleBase.FederationConfiguration%2A> propriedade já foi inicializada.

trans-unit.source: You can get the configuration object that is in effect for this module from this property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode obter o objeto de configuração que está em vigor para este módulo dessa propriedade.
